channel.title: General Chicago Holidays Thanksgiving on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in General Chicago Holidays Thanksgiving on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Happy thanksgiving
item.description: Happy thanksgiving! It has been a long and lazy day today. Pretty awesome. We are about to head out to a party at our friend Jill’s house. it should be fun. There were so many options this year. Quite a few people offered to include us in their families thanksgiving - it was a hard decision. I just picked the first one. haha. (and hopefully the one with the best food - as the hosts are all chefs at various places around the city).
